title: Silver Is for Secrets
description: I'll make you pay...School is over, and now Stacey, her boyfriend Jacob, and their friends have rented a beach cottage for the summer. No more stress, secrets, or stalkers. But then Stacey's nightmares returnâ€”predicting the cruel death of Clara, a mysterious girl with a secret.And now Jacob, the only one who understands Stacey's magic, is keeping secrets, too. Is he betraying Stacey's trust or protecting her from revenge and tragedy?
author: Laurie Faria Stolarz
